data.title: Film and Smart Surface Solutions
data.text:
We protect and enhance the value of our customer's products and brands with highly durable hardcoated polymer films. These films form the critical visual and tactile 1st surface of the human-machine interface (HMI) in automotive, consumer, commercial, industrial & medical applications.

Further, customers leverage our expertise in smart surfaces (including in-mold decoration (IMD), in-mold electronics (IME), and membrane and capacitive touch controls) to enhance the aesthetics and functionality of their designs and to optimize their production quality and yield.

Complementing these films are a range of screen-printing products, stencil systems and on-press chemistry that enhance customer's smart surfaces through excellent image reproduction over a wide range of applications.

Products

Our proprietary manufacturing processes produce stable, high quality films with exceptional clarity and low haze that are highly resistant to everyday wear and chemical attack.

Browse our portfolio of hardcoated and stabilized polycarbonate and polyester films together with our screen printing stencil systems and supporting chemistry.

Contact Us

We'd be delighted to hear from you with any comment, suggestion, question or request.

The company operates globally with local sales, support and distribution in over 50 countries.

For the best and most efficient response, please follow the contact us link and complete the form.

Once we have your form, one of our regional sales or technical specialists will contact you as soon as possible.
